document_data.name: Harfist
document_data.mainbody: '''Deputy Harfist''' was one of the deputies of [[Bron]] [[Bourstag]] of [[Voonlar]] in the [[Moonsea]] ''circa'' [[1373 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Harfist was a mountain of a man who loomed over his peers from almost {{SI|7'|'"|long=yes}}. He was armed with a massive two-handed [[axe]], strong enough to cleave an [[oak]] three in half with a a single strike.
